title: Lasion
description: An ancient fortified site in Elis, mentioned in multiple ancient sources. It has been identified with an unexcavated mound at a place now known as Kouti, which is located between the modern towns of Androniou and Koumani.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 13420
